name: grist-mcp-server
description: 22 tools for managing Grist documents with AI
long_description: Read and write tables, records, pages, and widgets. Works with Grist Cloud or self-hosted instances.

grist_api_key.title: Grist API Key
grist_api_key.description: Your Grist API key. Visit https://docs.getgrist.com/settings/keys to create one.

grist_base_url.title: Grist Base URL
grist_base_url.description: Base URL for your Grist instance. Use https://docs.getgrist.com for Grist Cloud or your self-hosted URL.

enable_debug_mode.title: Debug Mode
enable_debug_mode.description: Enable detailed logging and diagnostics. Automatically sets log level to 'debug' and enables tool call logging.

enable_metrics.title: Performance Metrics
enable_metrics.description: Collect and log performance statistics every 60 seconds.

tools.name: grist_get_workspaces
tools.description: List and filter workspaces

tools.name: grist_get_documents
tools.description: Find documents by ID, name, or workspace

tools.name: grist_get_tables
tools.description: Get table structure and schema

tools.name: grist_query_sql
tools.description: Run SQL queries with JOINs and aggregations

tools.name: grist_get_records
tools.description: Fetch records with filters

tools.name: grist_add_records
tools.description: Insert new records

tools.name: grist_update_records
tools.description: Modify records by row ID

tools.name: grist_upsert_records
tools.description: Add or update by unique key (sync)

tools.name: grist_delete_records
tools.description: Delete records permanently

tools.name: grist_create_table
tools.description: Create table with columns

tools.name: grist_rename_table
tools.description: Rename table

tools.name: grist_delete_table
tools.description: Delete table permanently

tools.name: grist_create_summary_table
tools.description: Create summary tables for aggregations and chart data sources

tools.name: grist_manage_columns
tools.description: Add, modify, delete, rename columns

tools.name: grist_manage_conditional_rules
tools.description: Add visual formatting rules that highlight cells based on conditions

tools.name: grist_create_document
tools.description: Create new Grist documents or copy existing ones

tools.name: grist_get_pages
tools.description: Introspect document structure including pages, widgets, and summary tables

tools.name: grist_build_page
tools.description: Create pages with pre-configured widget layouts and linking

tools.name: grist_configure_widget
tools.description: Configure widget properties, linking, sorting, and filtering

tools.name: grist_update_page
tools.description: Rename, reorder, or delete existing pages

tools.name: grist_manage_webhooks
tools.description: Create and manage webhooks for real-time event notifications

tools.name: grist_help
tools.description: Get detailed documentation and examples for any tool
